### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(111.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -79.5)) that puts into furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Belt group (position (39.5, -83.5)) that connects the furnace at position(41.0, -80.0) to burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)

### Offshore pump group at position(116.5, -54.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -54.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (115.5, -51.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -53.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -49.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -47.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -45.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (115.5, -43.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (115.5, -41.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (116.5, -40.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (118.5, -40.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (120.5, -40.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (122.5, -39.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (124.5, -39.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (126.5, -37.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (128.5, -35.5))
-  Offshore pump (position (130.5, -33.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities but being given incorrect number of arguments
-  Make sure to pass the correct number of arguments to the connect_entities function. It should be two positions and a prototype.

### Errors when using connect_entities but given positions are floats
-  Make sure to convert the positions to integers before passing them to the connect_entities function.

### Errors when using connect_entities but positions do not have a 'position' attribute
-  Make sure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function have a 'position' attribute. If not, access the position directly.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables that have been assigned:
- offshore_pump: an OffshorePump entity
- boiler: a Boiler entity
- Prototype.Pipe: a prototype for a pipe entity
